entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6 with temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 6 with temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
